channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-5242] Most Stomp tests fail or hang on AIX
item.description:
The stomp tests tend to hang on JDK6, or fail with an error like the one below on JDK7. For now I'm going to update the pom to exclude them because they cause the JDK6 builds to hang.

org.apache.activemq.transport.stomp.Stomp11NIOSSLTest.testSendMessageWithStandardHeadersEncoded

Failing for the past 3 builds (Since Aborted#6 )
Took 2.5 sec.
add description
Error Message

Remote host closed connection during handshake
Stacktrace

javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: Remote host closed connection during handshake

item.summary: Most Stomp tests fail or hang on AIX

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment: We're seeing similar failures on Solaris and Windows, I've updated the pom to reflect those too.

Please update if this is still an issue with the master/main branch. STOMP tests have been improved and pass (for the most part) since this ticket was created.

This ticket is being marked to be closed in 30 days due to age and inactivity.
